title: Jump on this...
body:
I thought of a champ who is able "jump" or bounce off enemies, this can have various effects for a cool combo.

jump = root and bounce
jump = shockwave and bounce
jump = propel (like lee ult)

there would be like a recharge period after a jump where you would be vulnerable

so the end game would look like cc, mobility and cooldowns where you need to stay safe

wombo combo guy

replies.body: Wtf are you saying?!?!?!? Please elaborate on your master plan of having a champion with trampolines stuck on all sides
uhh ok, like quinn face vault but you can choose where to jump off to and what happens when you jump off. Like cc and "kiting" so to speak
Gnar and Orianna put together pretty much.
